author: markt
msg: Cache resources loaded by the class loader from /META-INF/services/ for better performance for repeated look ups.

author: oheger
msg: Started rework of INIConfiguration to be compatible with immutable nodes.
Loading the configuration now creates a hierarchy of immutable nodes.

author: oheger
msg: Some cleanup of methods related to sub configurations.
Removed unused methods. Made a method protected which is needed by sub classes.

author: psteitz
msg: Udpated dependencies; implemented final pool 2.x API; replaced sandbox parent; reformatted some code.

author: oheger
msg: This method allows tracking a child node of a selected node. If the child does
not exist, it is created dynamically.
